item.title: A Fake Artist Goes To New York
item.description: A Fake Artist Goes To New York Created: 2022-05-08 17:11 Like Spyfall but with drawing. Everyone knows what the subject is except for the fake artist and they all take turns drawing a stroke on a collective drawing while they try and guess who has no idea what they are drawing.

item.title: Camel Up
item.description: Camel Up Created: 2022-05-08 17:08 The camels are racing. You are betting on the race? The camels can jump on top of each other and be carried?

item.title: Cosmic Encounter
item.description: Cosmic Encounter Created: 2022-05-08 17:08 Imagine poker with aliens. Imagine if all the aliens have overpowered abilities. Ally, negotiate, bluff and betray other players in other to be the first player to put 5 colonies outside your home system.

item.title: Deception Murder in Hong Kong
item.description: Deception Murder in Hong Kong Created: 2022-05-08 16:55 A cross between [[Mysterium]] and [[Cluedo]]. The Forensic Investigator know who the murderer is as well as the weapon and evidence but they can’t say anything.

item.title: Descent Journeys in the Dark
item.description: Descent Journeys in the Dark Created: 2022-05-08 17:09 One of the quintessential dungeon crawler games. Explore dungeons, fight monsters, level up your characters.

item.title: Hanabi
item.description: Hanabi Created: 2022-05-08 17:08 Co-op card game where you hold your cards facing the other players so that you can’t see them.

item.title: Holding On
item.description: Holding On Created: 2022-05-05 15:28 The first serious commercial board game? References https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/245444/holding-troubled-life-billy-kerr

item.title: Love Letter
item.description: Love Letter Created: 2022-05-08 17:09 A super simple card game where you can only have one card in your hand, you pick up a card and play one of them.

item.title: Mage Knight
item.description: Mage Knight Created: 2022-05-08 17:03 A really long and complicated game where it’s best played solo. Fantasy game where you explore the world, fight enemies, build an army and take over cities.

item.title: One Night Werewolf
item.description: One Night Werewolf Created: 2022-05-08 17:10 It’s Werewolf/Mafia but in one round and there’s no moderator. Lots of different roles so it’s all about trying to figure out who everyone is by piecing together what they did in the night time phase.

item.title: Pandemic Legacy
item.description: Pandemic Legacy Created: 2022-05-08 17:01 Based off a co-op game called [[Pandemic]] where you travel around the world to try and stop diseases from spreading.

item.title: Spyfall
item.description: Spyfall Created: 2022-05-08 17:05 Everyone knows what the secret location is except for the spy. Players want to find out who the spy is while the spy wants to know the location.

item.title: Tragedy Looper
item.description: Tragedy Looper Created: 2022-05-08 17:11 It’s like an anime where the protagonists are stuck in a time loop where a tragedy always keeps happening.
